CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, July 10, 1954, pg. 11, reads: "THE EMANONES CELEBRATE - The Emanones celebrated their graduation from Baxter Junior High School with a semi-formal at the Fort Pitt Hotel, June 23. Pictured are members (first row) Beverly Scott, treasurer; Arnetta Monroe, secretary; Elizabeth Johnson, president; John Haines, Minnie Pipkin, social chairman; Paquita Sharp, vice president; and Lillian Sellers.  Second row: Sandra Givner and Aylce Perrin.  Third row: Diane DeHall, Gloria Sweeney, Carol Haines and Joyce Davis.  Fourth row: Phyllis Brundidge, Marian Lytch, Carolyn Taylor, Geraldine Totes, Thomas Pitts, Mary Stephens, Bernice Troy, Horace Hord, Mary Ayers, Kerry Thompson and Carolyn Berry.  - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Young women wearing light colored gowns and young men of Emanones Club dancing in Fort Pitt Hotel for Baxter Junior High School prom
